overview: Crotch-chopping, brash, obnoxious, naked, rule-breaking, icon, muscular, beautiful, blood-covered, pyro blasts, main events, obscenity-laced, declaring war, pissing everyone off, DX-rated home movies, legend killers, sweet chin music. title: WWF: D-Generation X
